name: estimate_market_value
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool car_utils.
Tool description: FREE resources for checking VIN, getting the market value of your car, estimating the cost of ownership in US,  checking fuel economy, and more to come.
API description: Estimates the market value of a car given its VIN and optionally its mileage using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

mileage.description: Current mileage of the car.  If unspecified, an estimate will be used.
